text: Rattlesnakes is a 2019 film directed by Julius Amedume and produced by Nik Powell of Scala Productions. It is based on the stage play Rattlesnakes written by Graham Farrow. Starring Jack Coleman and Jimmy Jean-Louis, the story revolves around Robert McQueen, whose day takes a turn for the worse when he is held hostage and accused by three vengeful husbands of sleeping with their wives. However, the truths they hear will change their lives forever. ==References== == External links == * * Category:2019 films Category:American films based on plays
title: Rattlesnakes (film)
